texts.es: Doña  Beronica, procreo junto a su esposo 6 hijos, hoy en día todos son mayores de edad, ella se dedica  al comercio, vende ropa   calzado, cosméticos y algunos productos de temporada. Para Beronica la mayor dificultad que ha tenido es no contar con apoyo para estudiar, solamente llego hasta el quinto grado, espera salir adelante con su negocio, solicita este crédito para invertir en variedades de ropa, esperando así aumentar sus ingresos.
texts.en:
Beronica and her husband begot six children, all of them adults now. She is a businesswoman who sells clothes, shoes, cosmetics and some seasonal products. Beronica thinks that the biggest challenge she has faced was not having support to study beyond the fifth grade.

She hopes to be able to get ahead with her business, so she is requesting a loan to buy assorted clothes with the goal to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy pants, shirts, skirts and cosmetics to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to improve her home (and buy bricks, cement, sand and to pay for labourers).

loans.name: Nairi

texts.en:
Nairi is a 40 year old woman and she lives in Sevan city in Gegharkunik region.  She graduated from Yerevan State University with a major in biology.  Nairi is married and she has a son and a daughter.  For several years she did not work since her children needed great care and attention.  Now they are already grown up and soon her daughter will graduate from school.

Nairi works at the local school as a teacher of biology.  Her husband is a construction worker.  He does not have constant work and constant income.  His work and income from it is seasonal and sometimes just enough to cover their family’s first needs and nothing else.  Their flat furniture is worn out and their flat has become unattractive during the years since it has not been repaired for a long time.

Nairi asks for a loan of 900.000 Armenian Drams in order to make their small flat more comfortable and to buy kitchen and guest room furniture for their flat.

loans.use: to make their small flat more comfortable and to buy kitchen and guest room furniture for their flat

loans.name: Mayramoy

texts.en:
Mayramoy is an industrious woman.  She is 31 years old.  Mayramoy is married but does not have any children.  Her husband has been busy with animal husbandry.  Mayramoy has also organized her own business with animal husbandry 6 month ago. 

Mayramoy feeds cows.  She feeds milk cow and sells milk, kefir and sour cream to the local people. She is going to develop her new business.  With this aim she took part in a course ‘To get Ahead’ from the women's organization and got a certificate.  She is asking for a loan of 550 TJS to buy a milk cow. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy cattle for organizing a new business

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a 38-year-old married woman. She has five children. She describes herself to be honest and happy. She operates a grocery store where she sells tomatoes and cabbages. She has been involved in this business for ten years. Her business is located in a busy area and her primary customers are general customers. She describes her biggest business challenge to be low sales. She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy more stock of tomatoes and cabbages. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a different life. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM

loans.use: to buy more stock of tomatoes and cabbages.

loans.name: Heghine

texts.en:
Heghine is from Tsaghkunq village of the Armavir region. She lives there with her husband, mother-in-law, and two little children. Her husband is employed in the private sector and works hard to sustain his family's living. Heghine herself has been involved in farming activities. 
With the help of her mother-in-law, Heghine cultivates vegetables. They work hard to gather a good harvest and sell the gathered products in nearby markets.
Heghine has now applied for this loan to ask for financial support for her farm. She plans to purchase seeds and fertilizer for land cultivation. This will allow her to increase agricultural turnover and make her farm sustainable. This is Heghine's second loan. She has taken a loan from local financial institutions before, but because of very difficult financial conditions, wasn't able to pay it back on time. Now, by ensuring that her farming business is successful and being able to provide monthly payments for this loan, Heghine has now been approved for a loan within the framework of a new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The second chance loan program provides loans to people who have a bad credit history and have no access to credit products.

loans.use: to pay for seeds and fertilizer for land cultivation.

loans.name: Heriqnaz

texts.en:
Heriqnaz lives in Samaghar village with her husband, mother-in-law and three children.  She is a farmer with many years of experience cultivating potatoes, tomatoes, cabbages and greens.  The whole family works hard to organize the cultivation process in appropriate ways, ensuring stable income from the farm. 

Heriqnaz has now applied for this loan to ask for financial support.  She plans to purchase seeds, fertilizer and supplies for renovating the greenhouse.  This will be a big support for Heriqnaz's farm and she will be able to be prepared for spring work.

loans.use: to pay for seeds, fertilizer and supplies for renovating the greenhouse

loans.name: Maria Isabel

texts.es: María tiene 24 años de edad y habita en casa propia junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 4 años de edad. María se dedica a la prestación de servicios domésticos y es así como lleva el sustento a su hogar. María y su familia habitan en condiciones muy sencillas pero son personas muy trabajadoras, luchadoras y responsables. María solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la reparación del techo de la vivienda ya que se encuentra deteriorado por lo que con el monto solicitado comprará lámina galvanizada y hierro. De esta forma espera dar mayor seguridad y mejores condiciones a su familia.
texts.en: María is 24 years old and lives in her own house with her partner and young, four-year-old daughter. María makes a living as a domestic servant and, with this work, is able to support her own household. María and her family live in a very simple home but they are hard-working, plucky and responsible people. María is applying for this loan from "FUSAI" in order to invest in repairing the roof of her house as it is currently in a bad condition. This loan will be used o buy galvanised metal sheeting and iron. With this loan María hopes to offer her family more security and better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy galvanised metal sheeting and iron in order to repair the roof of her house.

loans.name: Hakob

texts.en:
Hakob is 38 years old, and he lives in the village of Norashen in the Ararat region. Hakob is not married, and he lives now with his mother and his brother’s family. All they are busy with farming and agriculture. 

Hakob also has a small business of fruit & vegetable sales (grapes, peaches, apricots, plums, apples, tomatoes, greens, etc.) at the local wholesale small market. His stall products are mainly the harvest of their fruit and vegetable garden, which is the result of their day and night work at their farm. 

But now this family has a very urgent problem which needs great finances for its solution.  Hakob’s mother has very serious health problems, and her heart needs to be operated on very quickly. The operation is a very expensive one, and they are short of time.

Hakob asks a loan of 700.000 Armenian drams, which is the half of his mother’s operation amount; the other half his brother will add in order to organize and solve this question as soon as possible.

loans.use: to pay for his mother's heart operation.

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur is 46 years old. He lives in Yerevan city. Artur is married, and he lives with his wife and his parents. 

In his family, only Artur and his wife are employed; his parents are pensioners. Artur works at a private company as a leading specialist and his wife works at the computer service center as a chief manager. This family is very nice; they love and respect each other greatly, but their happiness is somehow incomplete and there is a space which can be fulfilled only by a child, which is greatly wanted and expected by all of them.

Artur asks a loan of 1.100.000 Armenian drams since they want to find a good specialist and pass a course of treatment which will help them to have a baby.

loans.use: to find a good specialist and pass a course of treatment which will help them to have a baby

loans.name: Arman

texts.en:
Arman is 35 years old and he lives in the village of Lusahovit in the Tavush region. 

Despite of his young age, Arman is already the father of three children; two daughters, who are school-aged, and a small son. His wife now does not work; she takes care of their big family and at the same time helps Arman in farming and agriculture. Together with his wife they take care of two cows, three piglets and 25 chickens. 

On his plot of land Arman cultivates grain and fruits such as figs, pears, apples and nuts. All his farm products Arman sells at the Ijevan wholesale market. Arman also gives private car repairing services in his village. As he says, being engaged in different activities helps him to provide his family with normal living conditions.

Arman asks a loan of 1.200.000 Armenian drams since he wants to make his fruit garden bigger and buy layers for the fruit garden. He also wants to buy a cow, two piglets, and animal fodder for his farm animals.

loans.use: to improve his fruit garden and buy a cow, two piglets and animal fodder

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more charcoal for her  business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more charcoal for her business.

loans.name: Zamira

texts.en:
Zamira was born in 1976. She is widowed, and lives with her family in a rural area. Zamira lives with her son Doston, her daughter-in-low Bunafsha and her two grandchildren. 

Zamira has been busy with animal husbandry and growing agricultural products more than 15 years. She grows potatoes and she feeds cows. Zamira’s son helps her with growing and selling potatoes; she sells the potatoes in a local market. She also sells milk to local people, as she feeds milk cows. 

She is asking for a loan of 1,000 somoni to buy seeds and a cow. She awaits your support.

loans.use: To buy seeds and a cow

loans.name: Arshak

texts.en:
Arshak is 40 years old and he lives in Ijevan city in the Tavush region. Arshak is married and he has two school-aged daughters. His wife does not work and she is a housewife. 

Arshak for several years worked at different private companies as a driver, but the last years he has had a small fruit and vegetable sale business at the city wholesale market. He buys his stall products from the villagers and the citrus fruits assortment from resellers from Georgia. Arshak also does seasonal work in the Russian Federation. He works hard since he is the only breadwinner of his family. He says in April he will also go there since it is a good period for constructional work that he used to do there.

Arshak asks a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams since his last savings of money served for a slight repairing of their house, but they have no money for furniture. He hopes that this loan will help him to buy kitchen furniture and a sofa for living room.

loans.use: to buy kitchen furniture and a sofa for the living room.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more bread, cold water, and oil for her business.

loans.name: Leo Dan

texts.es:
Leo vive en el distrito de la tinguiña, es un hombre muy trabajador, actualmente trabaja como chofer de taxi, su humilde empleo es la única fuente de ingresos para poder salir adelante, es por ello que se esfuerza mucho cada día.

Leo está agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá  realizar un mantenimiento a su vehículo y reparar el motor y de esta manera poder tener un vehículo en mejores condiciones y luchar por hacer realidad su sueño:” Tener una flota de vehículos”.
texts.en:
Leo lives in the district of Tinguiña. He is a very hardworking man. Today he works as a taxi driver. His humble employment is the only source of income for him to be able to get ahead in life, which is why he works hard each day.

Leo is grateful to the Kiva lenders. Thanks to the help that they have provided him he will be able to maintain and repair the motor of his vehicle and in this way be able to have a vehicle in better condition and be able to fight to make his dream a reality: "to have a fleet of vehicles".

loans.use: to maintain and repair his vehicle's motor.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia is a 41-year-old married woman. She has two children. She describes herself to be creative and skilled. 

She operates a clinic where she offers medical services. She has been involved in this business for 15 years. Her business is located in a business friendly place, and her primary customers are regular. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be a lack of high tech equipment. 

She will use the Kes 20,000 loan to buy a stock of medicine and other medical equipment. 

Her business goal is to have a well equipped clinic within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have a stable source of income. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy a stock of medicine and other medical equipment.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is a 28-year-old married man. He has three children. He describes himself as honest. 

He operates a retail business where he sells paint, battery water, paint brushes and other items. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a competitive area and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge as lack of capital. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stock of paint, paint brushes and other items. 

His business goal is to have more stock within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will own a big shop. He will use the anticipated profits to add more stock of items he sells.

loans.use: to buy more stock of paint, paint brushes and other items.

loans.name: Khursheed's Group

texts.en:
Khursheed is age 50; she is living with her six children and husband in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her husband has been selling fruit for many years; he sells seasonal fresh fruit from his shop in his hometown. The people like to buy fruits from him because his rates are very reasonable. Due to fruit’s suitable prices, he has obtained a regular list of customers, and makes enough to contribute to the family income. Due to his reputation, the demand for fruit has increased, and he sells out of his stock by noon.

Khursheed feels proud of her husband and appreciates his efforts for his family, even in his old age. 

She is taking a loan for her husband so that he would be able to buy fruit in greater quantities and sizes so he could sell fruit till evening. 

Khursheed wants to save the excess profit so she could utilize these savings for sudden needs in the future, and for her children.

loans.use: To buy fresh and seasonal fruit to sell.

loans.name: Atika

texts.en:
Atika is a 37-year-old single woman, living with her family in Hodieda, Yemen in her own house. She had studied at elementary school, and now she is an employee in the health office in Hodieda. 

She could accumulate an amount of money in order to improve her family income by opening a clinic in her house and purchasing medical materials and requirements for a small clinic. 

Unfortunately, due to a lack of enough money, she is unable to meet the high daily demands of her clients, so she applied for a loan of 200,000 YER from AMB in order to purchase more medical materials and requirements.  

She looks forward to opening a large clinic in her home, and also she hopes to provide her family with better living conditions.

loans.use: To open a medical clinic

loans.name: Irina

texts.en:
Irina is 36 years old. She lives in Ijevan city in Tavush region. Irina has a large family. She lives with her husband, three sons and parents-in-law. Her sons are school-aged and her family’s other members all are employed.

Irina herself is rather successful and clever businesswoman. It is already three years that she has had a small bakery workshop. She has three workers with whom she works without holidays, since she has many loyal customers the orders of whom she must manage on time. Irina also works with several food shops that also give orders at the end of week. Irina makes a great assortment of very nice and tasty baked goods and cakes. Her workshop is always clean and cute and the products there are fresh.
 
Irina asks a loan of 1,200,000 Armenian drams in order to develop her business by buying sugar, flour and butter so she will be ready to fulfill any order from her customers.

loans.use: to buy sugar, flour and butter so she will be ready to fulfill any order from her customers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more used clothes for her business.

loans.name: David

texts.en:
David is a 52-year-old married man. He has four children. He describes himself as determined. 

He operates a farm where he sells potatoes and carrots. He has been involved in this business for 20 years. His business is located in a productive and busy place and his primary customers are of all types. He describes his biggest business challenge as lack of enough farm inputs. 

He will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy seeds and fertilizer to enable him to increase production. His business goal is to do large-scale farming within five years. He hopes that in the future, he will be prosperous. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer to enable him to increase production.

loans.name: Varduhi

texts.en:
Varduhi lives in Narek village with her family. She is a mother of two little children, ages 5 and 1 year old. Varduhi, together with her mother-in-law, has been running a farm for 10 years. They grow apricot and peach trees and sell the gathered harvest locally. Varduhi also keeps 20 chickens and sells the gathered eggs in nearby markets. The main income of the family comes from agriculture, so running a successful farm is very important for them. 

Varduhi has now applied for this loan to be able to purchase fertilizer, seeds and forage for chickens. That will be a big support for the whole family, and they hope for lenders' support of their farm.

loans.use: to pay for fertilizer, seeds and forage for chickens

loans.name: Vardan

texts.en:
Vardan is 38 years old, and he lives in Dilijan city. Vardan already is a skilled farmer, and through farming, he manages to earn for his family's living. He is married, and he has two children. 

Vardan works very hard with his wife; they take care of their five cows and four calves. They sell a great variety of dairy products and meat. They have their loyal customers, and thanks to their not expensive prices and fresh farm products, their sales bring rather good income.
  
Vardan asks for a loan of 500,000 Armenian drams, since he wants to buy a lot of animal fodder for his cattle and keep it fed until the pastures will become full in the middle of the spring season.

loans.use: to buy a lot of animal fodder for his cattle to keep it fed until the pastures become full in the middle of the spring season

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more fufu, salt, oil and onion for her business.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more pepper, oil, fish, meat, salt, rice, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Cumshud

texts.en:
Cumshud lives with his wife and two children in the Horadiz village of the Fuzuli region. He is an Internally Displaced Person from an occupied zone — Fuzuli city. He is 41 years old. The elder son of Cumshud is 15 years old, and he is going to the 10th class of school. Another child also is school-aged; she is going to the seventh class. 

Cumshud has a store, and he sells mixed goods in the store. Today, he has applied to Komak company for a loan in the amount of 1,500 AZN (Azerbaijan New Manat) to buy more products for his store. He is thankful to the Kiva organization and lenders for their aid and support.

loans.use: to buy more products for his store

loans.name: Shehnaz's Group

texts.en:
Shehnaz is a 53-year-old married woman, living with her family in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. Her son has been running a cosmetics store for 10 years and generates income for his family. He sells beauty products such as shampoo, lotions, creams, artificial jewelry, nail polish and ladies' undergarments. 

Nowadays, demand for export quality products has increased, but due to the unavailability of export quality products, he has to refuse his customers. He does not have enough savings for the further investment into the current enterprise. In fact, his major generated income is spent on household expenses and his father’s medical expenses. 

Therefore, Shehnaz has requested a loan for her son’s business to empower him for buying export quality cosmetic products. He hopes that now he can grow his business and can generate reasonable income. Shehnaz thanks Kiva and its field partner for this honorable support.

loans.use: To buy export quality cosmetics for resale.

loans.name: Musrat

texts.en:
Musrat is a 33-year-old married lady who has been running a small general store in her community for many years. She offers a variety of grocery items at a reasonable price and has retained many customers who regularly shop at her store. Musrat makes enough to provide for her family. 

To make her store fully stocked, she requested a loan for 50,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees), which she will use to buy packs of rice, sugar and flour from the market at lower rates. In this way, she will be able to meet the increasing demand consistently. She wishes to utilize part of her revenues to increase her business capital.

loans.use: to buy packs of rice, sugar and flour.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 48-year-old married woman. She describes herself to be visionary and focused. She operates a farm where she grows tea. She also keeps dairy cows that produce milk for selling. She has been involved in this business for seven years. Her business is located in a productive and promising place, and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be price fluctuations. 

She will use the 20,000 Kenyan shillings loan to buy feeds for her dairy cows. Her business goal is to be a successful farmer within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will be successful.

loans.use: to buy feeds for her dairy cows

loans.name: Samvel

texts.en:
Samvel is 43 years old and he lives in Dilijan city. Samvel lives with his wife and they have no children. Both Samvel and his wife are employed; he works at the private company as a driver-distributer and his wife works at the medical college. Samvel’s parents, who are pensioners, live in a nearby village Chambarak and if Samvel has free time after his work he helps his parents to take care of their farm animals. They have 3 cows and 2 calves. He also helps them to sell their farm products such as milk, meat and cheese. Samvel has some saved money and a great wish that he hopes will become true by the help of Kiva lenders.
He asks for a loan of 700,000 Armenian drams which together with his saved money will be enough for the purchase of a car for his small family.

loans.use: to purchase a car for his small family, which together with his saved money will be enough for it

loans.name: Larisa

texts.en:
Larisa is a 43-year-old married woman. She lives in the small village of Senaki district with her son, daughter-in-law and a pensioner mother-in-law. Larisa is involved in an animal-husbandry business. She has two cows, milks them every day and produces dairy products to sell. In addition, the family has a land where nut trees are grown. They also sell the harvested nuts at a good price. 

Larisa's husband is a cook at a local restaurant and has a small monthly income. 

Larisa decided to start trading calves and requested a loan. The Start Up program, which is a joint initiative with Kiva and Credo, enables her to get a loan of 2,000 GEL (Gerogia lari) for starting the trading business. With the received loan, she will purchase calves and resell them at a higher price. Larisa hopes that the business will be profitable, and she awaits your support.

loans.use: to begin trading calves

loans.name: Shahnaz

texts.en:
Shahnaz is a 27-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She runs a small boutique at home to provide for her family. She always has a great collection to offer to her customers. She purchases cloth from the market at low prices, and after doing embroidery and sewing, she sells it to the people of her locality. She earns a good amount of income to contribute to the family income. 

For the improvement of her business, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani rupees) so that she can buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in different colors. It will allow her to fulfill the demands of her customers on time. She is in her fifth loan cycle with a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth and spools of thread in different colors.

loans.name: Hasmik

texts.en:
Hasmik is married and has one adult child who works in construction. She is a pharmacist working in the local pharmacy. Hasmik is also involved in farming activities. She cultivates tomatoes and sells the harvest locally. As a hardworking woman, she does her best to earn enough income for her family's well being.

Because her farm needs some financial investments, Hasmik requested her first loan, which she will use to purchase seeds and fertilizer and cover cultivation costs. This loan will be a big support for her farming business and has been approved within the framework of the new joint initiative between Kiva and SEF. The first-chance loan program provides loans to people who did not have access to credit products in the past because they have no credit history.

loans.use: to purchase seed and fertilizer and cover cultivation costs

loans.name: Shamshad

texts.en: Shamshad is a 38-year-old married woman. She has been successfully running a small general store with her husband (also shown in the photo). He assists her by purchasing stock from the market and dealing with customers at the shop. Over time they have become popular in their community for providing good quality products and they make enough to meet their household expenses. Currently, she has requested a loan of PKR 40,000 to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages to meet the increasing demand at their store. She is expecting a boost in their earnings, and dreams of expanding their business in the future.

loans.use: to buy packs of salts, biscuits and beverages.

loans.name: Felimon

texts.es:
Felimon tiene 66 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío Alto Sondor, una zona rural del distrito de Pomahuaca, una comunidad con clima caluroso su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café desde hace 10 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor controlando el trabajo de los jornaleros, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 000 nuevos soles para la compra abonos y pago de mano de obra para el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café y de esta manera tener una producción adecuada para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Felimon, age 66, lives with his wife and children in the village of Alto Sondor.  It is a rural zone in the Pomahuaca district.  The community has a warm climate, and the people work in agriculture, commerce, and with livestock.  It is located in the Jaén Province in the Región Cajamarca in the northern highlands of Peru.

He has been farming, especially growing coffee, for ten years.  His wife helps him with this work by managing the day workers’ work.

He has requested a loan for 2,000 soles to buy fertilizer and to pay for the labor to maintain his coffee crops.  This way he will have an adequate production to offer his customers.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and to pay for the labor to maintain his coffee crops.

loans.name: Rosa Irene

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo que se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su gran artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.
En este lugar vive la señora Rosa, tiene 73 años de edad, está casada y de esa relación tienen seis hijos mayores de edad e independientes, solo uno de ellos aun vive con ella. Su esposo es comerciante aunque ya casi no trabaja ya que está enfermo.
Doña Rosa  tiene una tienda en su casa  en la cual vende de todo tipo de productos como arroz, azúcar, granos, detergentes, legumbres, carne, pescado, pollo entre otros productos de primera necesidad, además de gas de uso domestico lo cual le deja ingresos extra ya que es un producto indispensable en los hogares para preparara los alimentos y son pocos los lugares que venden en el sector. Trabaja todos los días desde las 6h00 hasta las 20h00, lleva más de 30 años con su negocio, su hijo y su esposo le ayudan en su negocio.
Este nuevo crédito lo va a invertir en comprar productos de primera necesidad para abastecer su tienda y gas de uso domestico. Esta desde el inicio en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir aumentando su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo" [Towards Development With Love and Faith] meets every fortnight in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city which is well-known for its cultural richness and wonderful handicrafts such as the Panama straw hats which are well known both at home and abroad. This is where Rosa lives. She is 73 years old and is married, and has six children from her marriage who are now grown up and independent. Only one of them still lives with her. Her husband is a trader although he hardly works now as he is unwell.

Rosa has a shop in her home where she sells all sorts of products such as rice, sugar, grains, detergents, vegetables, meat, fish, chicken and other essential grocery items. She also sells household gas which gives her an extra income as it is an essential requirement in homes for cooking food and there are not many places in the area which sell it. She works every day from 6am to 8pm. She has had her business for more than 30 years and her husband and son help her in the business.

She will use the new loan to buy basic groceries to stock her shop and household gas. She has been in the communal bank since the beginning and likes it because of the help she gets from the loans. Her dream is to continue to grow her business.

loans.use: to buy grocery essentials and household gas.

loans.name: Alba Alejandrina

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo que se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su gran artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.
En este lugar vive la señora Alba, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen cinco hijos mayores de edad, uno de ellos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es comerciante.
Doña Alba con la finalidad de ganar algo por su cuenta y con esto contribuir con los gastos del hogar se dedica a la venta de ropa de todo tipo, su forma de  venta es puerta a puerta y también vende en su  casa  hasta donde llegan sus clientes cuando lleva mercadería nueva, la cual va a comprar a Huaquillas cada vez que necesita. Ella sale por la localidad y otras cercanas ofreciendo sus prendas las mismas  que deja a crédito  y que cobra cada quince días. Tiene 5 años que se dedica a esta actividad.  Su marido que se dedica a la venta de frutas y legumbres para lo cual también invierten parte del crédito.
Este crédito es para comprar ropa de temporada y una parte para frutas y legumbres. Lleva 8 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque con los créditos empezó su negocio el cual le ayuda a salir adelante. Sus sueños es seguir con su negocio.
texts.en:
The communal bank "Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo" [Towards Development With Love and Faith] meets every fortnight in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city which is well-known for its cultural richness and wonderful handicrafts such as the Panama straw hats which are well known both at home and abroad. This is where Alba lives. She is 52 years old and is married, and has five grown up children from her marriage. One of them still lives at home with her. Her husband is a trader.

In order to earn some money herself so that she can contribute to the household expenses, Alba makes a living selling all sorts of clothing. She sells from door to door and also sells from home where customers visit her when she has new stock. She goes to Huaquillas to buy this whenever she needs to. She goes around her neighbourhood and other local areas selling her clothing. She leaves items on credit terms and collects the payments every fortnight. She has been doing this for 5 years. Her husband sells fruit and vegetables so they will also use part of the loan for this. 

This loan is to buy seasonal clothing and a part of it is for fruit and vegetables. Alba has been in the communal bank for 8 years and likes it because she used the loans to start her business, which is helping her to make progress in life. Her dream is to continue with her business.

loans.use: to buy clothing, fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase additional goods to sell

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge tiene 43 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

Junto a su esposa se dedican a la crianza y comercio de animales menores patos, gallinas, pavos, cuyes y cerdos, desde hace 15 años, El ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera ofrecerlo a un mejor precio a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Jorge is 43 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Oyotún, located in the Province of Chiclayo which belongs to the Lambayeque region, on the north coast of Peru.  The locals make a living from agriculture, livestock and commerce.

Together with his wife he has been raising and selling small animals such as ducks, chickens, guinea pigs and pigs for the last 15 years.

Jorge has asked for a loan of 1500 nuevos soles to buy balanced feed for fattening his animals so he can sell them to his customers at a better price.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed for fattening his animals.

loans.name: Maria Nelza

texts.es:
María Nelza tiene 35 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo e hijos en el Caserío El Frayle una zona rural del distrito de Santo Tomás, una comunidad de abundante vegetación y clima variado, ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

Ella se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de patos, gallinas y cuyes en la parte posterior a su domicilio, María se dedica a esta actividad para apoyar con los gastos familiares a su esposo, quien se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace 10 años y ganadería.

María ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 500 nuevos soles para la compra de cerdos para posteriormente engordarlos ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
María Nelza is 35 years old and lives with her husband and children in the hamlet of El Frayle, a rural area in the Santo Tomás district, situated in the Province of Cutervo which belongs to the Cajamarca region in the northern sierra of Peru. It is an area with abundant vegetation and a varied climate.

María makes a living raising and selling ducks, chickens and guinea pigs in the area at the back of her home. She does this so she can help her husband with the family's living costs. For 10 years her husband has made a living growing corn and also works in livestock.

María has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 500 nuevos soles to buy pigs so she can fatten them up and sell them at a better price.

loans.use: to buy pigs to sell.

loans.name: Grace Divine 2 Group

texts.fr:
Adjoa Dzidzinya, vit seule avec  4 enfants à charge. Âgée de 52 ans, elle réside  à Adidogomé au nord ouest de Lomé. Commerçante des œufs et du charbon de bois depuis 1995, Adjoa a l’estime de son entourage ainsi elle devient présidente du groupe grâce divine 2. 
Elle sollicite un crédit pour pouvoir acheter 13 sacs supplémentaires de charbons de bois afin de répondre aux besoins de sa clientèle.
 Divers autres produit sont commercialiser par les autre femmes du groupe grâce divine 2. Nous retenons entre autres les produits alimentaires, les habits, des céréales et des tubercules. Elles sollicitent chacune ce crédit pour augmenter leur stock d’approvisionnement et ainsi augmenter leurs marges bénéficiaires
texts.en:
Adjoa Dzidzinya lives alone with her four children. She is 52 years old and resides in Adidogomé northwest of Lomé. A merchant of eggs and charcoal since 1995, Adjoa has the respect of her friends and family, so she became president of the group "Grâce divine 2". She is requesting a loan to be able to purchase 13 sacks of additional charcoal to meet the needs of her customers. 

A variety of other products are marketed by the other women of the group "Grâce divine 2". The products include grocery items, clothing, grains, and tubers. The women are each requesting this loan to increase their stock of supplies and thus increase their profit margins.

loans.use: to purchase 2 sacks of charcoal

loans.name: Rubi

texts.en:
Rubi is a 47-year-old lively lady and the mother of five children; she has been stitching clothes for many years. She stitches for the people of her community and uses the income to support her entire family. However, due to a lack of availability of funds, she is unable to meet with the daily demands of her customers. 

For this reason, she requested a loan of 40,000 PKR (Pakistani Rupees) from Kashf Foundation. She intends to use this loan amount to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of lace, zippers and buttons to create a means of increasing revenue so she may be able to generate a steadier source of income. 

She is in her third loan cycle with good credit history.

loans.use: to buy more spools of threads in different colors with packs of lace, zippers and buttons.

loans.name: Farida

texts.en:
Farida is a 35-year-old, married woman. She has one child who is 16 years old. She describes herself as being persistent. 

Farida operates a food stall where she cooks fish to sell. She has been involved in this business for five years. Her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of enough stock. 

She will use the KES 10,000 loan to buy more stocks of fish. Her business goal is to expand within five years. She hopes that, in the future, she will be independent. This is her first loan with SMEP Deposit Taking Microfinance Limited (SMEP DTM).

loans.use: to buy more stocks of fish.

loans.name: Yeredon Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe YEREDON ont en moyenne  34 ans, 4 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à YANGASSO/SEGOU (la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente des produits divers et des habits.  Après avoir remboursés correctement leurs prêts précédents, les femmes du groupe YEREDON sont à leur  2ème  prêt solidaire. SALI 2ème femme   de la gauche vers la droite  sur la photo ,  compte utiliser son prêt pour  acheter 20 colliers en caoutchouc, 10 colliers en argent. Elle s’approvisionne à San. Elle effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 39 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  au logement, aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women of the group YEREDON average 34 years of age and four children each , all living in traditional extended families in YANGASSO/SEGOU (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). These women know one another through ties of kinship, and they work buying and selling a variety of items and clothing. After having correctly paid back their previous [individual] loans, the women of the group YEREDON are now on their second solidarity loan. 

SALI, the second woman from the left in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase 20 rubber necklaces and 10 silver necklaces. She gets her supplies in San and makes her sales to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash and often on credit. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 39,000 francs CFA that will be used to cover schooling costs. The rest will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of items, such as necklaces and clothing, to sell

loans.name: Rudorico

texts.es:
Rudorico tiene 45 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío El Campo, una zona rural del distrito de Callayuc, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Cutervo que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercio de ganado vacuno desde hace 10 años, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 2 501 nuevos soles a Edpyme Alternativa para la compra de alimentos balanceados para la producción de leche fresca y de esta manera tener una mayor producción de leche fresca a sus clientes, generando mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Rudorico is 45 years old and lives with his wife and children in the village of El Campo, a rural area in the Callayuc district. Its people work in agriculture, trade, and livestock in the province of Cutervo, which belongs to the Cajamarca Region in northern Peru.

He has been breeding and trading cattle for 10 years. His wife supports his work. He has requested a loan of 2501 PEN from Edpyme Alternative in order to purchase feed for the production of fresh milk. This would allow him to offer a greater production of fresh milk to his clients, thus generating more income for his family.

loans.use: buy feed for the production of fresh milk.

loans.name: Jose Manuel

texts.es:
José Manuel tiene 62 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el Caserío El Chingue, una zona rural del distrito de Pucará, una comunidad de clima caluroso, su población se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicad en la Provincia de Jaén que pertenece a la Región Cajamarca, sierra norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público en su propia mototaxi, trasladando a sus pasajeros a caseríos aledaños a su comunidad, ocasionalmente brinda servicios agrícolas mediante el arado con su yunta, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 1 000 nuevos soles para de repuestos para su mototaxi y de esta manera seguir brindando este servicio.
texts.en:
Jose Manuel is 62 years old, and lives with his wife and children in the village of El Chingue, a rural area in the district of Pucara, a community of warm weather. Its people work in agriculture, trade, and livestock in the province of Jaen, which belongs to the Cajamarca region, in northern Peru

He provides public transportation in his own rickshaw, taking passengers to nearby villages in their community. He occasionally provides agricultural services by plowing with his team. He has requested a loan of 1000 PEN from Edpyme Alternative for spare tires for his rickshaw so that he may continue providing this service.

loans.use: purchase spare tires and a tent for his rickshaw.

loans.name: Khatoona

texts.en:
Khatoona is living in the area of Lahore, Pakistan. She is a new member of BRAC Pakistan and Kiva, as well. 

Her husband drives an auto-rickshaw by profession. He hires the rickshaw on a daily basis, but he also has to pay fares. He wants to buy a new auto-rickshaw, but his savings do not allow him to make a purchase. 

Therefore, Khatoona contacted Kiva’s field partner, BRAC Pakistan, and described her financial problem. Khatoona hopes that, after buying a new rickshaw, her husband's income will increase and she could better look after her children. 

Khatoona seems very happy over this honorable act and gives thanks to Kiva and its field partner, BRAC Pakistan.

loans.use: to buy new auto-rickshaw for her husband.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, pepper, salt, fish, meat, coal, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Bendiya Group

texts.fr:
Les  femmes du groupe BENDIYA ont en moyenne  47 ans, 6 enfants et vivent toutes dans des familles traditionnelles élargies à MEDINE l’un des quartiers  de La ville de  SAN/SEGOU (la quatrième région  administrative de la république du Mali).
Ces femmes se sont connues à travers des liens de parenté et font  les activités d’achat et de vente des pièces  de pagnes, des légumes et des condiments.  Les femmes du groupe BENDIYA sont à leur 1er prêt solidaire. NIOMBOU 2ème femme   à gauche  sur la photo ;  compte utiliser son prêt pour acheter 14 pièces de pagnes. Elle s’approvisionne à Bamako. Elle effectue ses ventes, à une clientèle composée de femmes et d’hommes en espèce et souvent à crédit.
Elle envisage réaliser  un bénéfice moyen mensuel de 18 000FCFA qui sera utilisé  dans les dépenses relatives à la santé,  aux frais scolaires et le reste sera  réinvesti dans les activités.
texts.en:
The women of the group BENDIYA average 47 years of age and six children each, all living in traditional extended families in MEDINE, a district in San/Segou City (4th administrative region of the Republic of Mali). These women know one another through ties of kinship, and they work buying and selling 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa), vegetables, and condiments. The women of the group BENDIYA are on their first solidarity loan. 

NIOMBOU, the second woman from the left in the photo, intends to use her loan to purchase 14 lengths of 'pagne' cloth. She gets her supplies in Bamako. She makes her sales to a customer base composed of men and women paying with cash and often on credit. 

She envisions making an average monthly profit of 18,000 francs CFA that will be used to cover costs related to healthcare and schooling. The rest will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: to purchase 'pagnes' (the colorful cloth of western Africa)

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: buy a variety of beauty products.

loans.name: Santos

texts.es:
Santos tiene  46 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El brinda servicio de transporte público desde hace cinco años, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 000 nuevos soles para la compra de repuestos para su vehículo y una segunda parte para arreglos de su vivienda y de esta manera tener un lugar adecuado donde residir.
texts.en:
Santos is 46 years old. he lives with his wife and children in Morropon District, located in the Province of the same name, Piura Region, on the North Coast of Peru. The people here work in agriculture, commerce and raise livestock. 

Santos has provided public transport services for 5 years. He is requesting a loan of 1,000 PEN to buy parts for his vehicle and use a second portion of the loan to fix his house. In this manner he can have an adequate place to live.

loans.use: to buy parts for his vehicle.

loans.name: Eduardo

texts.es:
Eduardo tiene 31años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Morropon, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia del mismo nombre, ubicada en la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de ganado vacuno, su esposa le apoya en esta labor ordeñando las vacas para ofrecer la leche fresca a sus clientes, ha solicitado un préstamo de 500 nuevos soles para la compra un torete para posteriormente ofrecerlo a sus clientes a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Eduardo is 31 years old. He lives with his wife and children in the Morropon district, located in the Province of the same name, in the Piura Region on the North Coast of Peru. The people here work in farming, commerce and raise livestock.

Eduardo works raising and selling cattle. His wife helps him in this work, milking the cows to offer fresh milk to customers. He has requested a loan of 500 PEN to buy a young bull which he will later offer to his clients at a higher price.

loans.use: to buy a young bull.

loans.name: Jeremy

texts.en:
Jeremy is a farmer residing in Nkubu area of Eastern Kenya, with his wife and two children. He has been practicing farming for the past 15 years, with his income based on milk, bananas, and horticultural crops. He enjoys dairy farming the most, because of the good returns.  He is assured of daily income through selling milk in the local market. His biggest challenge is getting the right breed for his cows since only local breeds are available.

Jeremy chose Juhudi Kilimo because of the good service he gets from them. During the training, he learned how to budget his money, and how to use it in order to repay his loan without a problem. Through this loan, he will improve his family's living standards and pay school fees for his two children

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow.

loans.name: Carlos Alberto

texts.es:
Carlos Alberto tiene 41 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Oyotún, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales patos, gallinas, cuyes y cerdos, en la parte posterior a su domicilio desde hace 10 años, ha solicitado un préstamo a Edpyme Alternativa de 3 000 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y una segunda parte para la compra de cerdos pequeños para posteriormente engordarlos y ofrecerlos a un mejor precio.
texts.en:
Carlos Alberto is 41 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Oyotun, a community focused on agriculture, trade, and livestock that is located in the province of Chiclayo, which belongs to the Lambayeque region on the northern coast of Peru.

He has worked in breeding and marketing animals such as ducks, chickens, guinea pigs, and pigs, in the back part of his home for the past 10 years. He has requested a loan of 3000 PEN from Edpyme Alternativa to buy feed to fatten his animals. A second part is for purchasing small pigs to later fatten them and offer them at a better price.

loans.use: buy feed to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Youssef

texts.en: Youssef is a nineteen-year-old Lebanese single man. He is living with his parents and two siblings. He has worked as a plumber since 2011. He works on a freelance basis and there are many customers asking for his talented services. Youssef at this stage is in a real need of purchasing new plumbing tools and supplies to enable him to best satisfy his customer’s needs. He is sure that the solution to this problem is to take a youth loan from Kiva partner Vitas s.a.l. In the future, Youssef seeks to own a shop where he will sell plumbing tools and equipment.

loans.use: purchase new plumbing tools and supplies

loans.name: Nirgas

texts.en:
Nirgas has successfully built her business stitching clothes with the support of Kashf Foundation and Kiva. She has retained a good number of customers.  With her prior loan, she purchased required stitching material. 

Nirgas requested her fifth loan for 40,000 PKR, which she will use to buy more spools of threads in different colors along with the packs of laces, zippers, and buttons. This loan will allow her to stitch more dresses on time to to generate a healthier source of income.

loans.use: to purchase more spools of threads in different colors along with the packs of laces, zippers, and buttons.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: el cliente de 21 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, el se dedica a la venta de dulces por mayoreo, tiene clientela establecida por los buenos precios y la calidad del producto, con lo que obtiene de sus ganancias ayuda en los gastos del hogar, el cliente esta solicitando un préstamo a INTEGRAL para poder comprar mas dulces por mayor y así poder seguir con su trabajo ya que esa es su única fuente de ingresos y podrá ayudar a su familia sin limitaciones algunas.
texts.en: This client is 21 years old. He lives in his own home with his family. He sells wholesale candy with an established clientele, good prices, and product quality. He uses his profits to help in the home. This client is requesting a loan from INTEGRAL to purchase more candy wholesale so that he can continue his work. It is his only source of income and he can help his family be without some of their limitations.

loans.use: to purchase wholesale candy.

loans.name: Benjamin

texts.es:
Benjamín tiene 59 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Cayaltí, una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería ubicada en la Provincia de Chiclayo que pertenece a la Región Lambayeque, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales menores pavos, gallinas y cuyes en la parte posterior de su domicilio, su esposa le apoya en esta labor, ha solicitado un préstamo de 1 500 nuevos soles para la compra de alimentos balanceados para engorde de sus animales y de esta manera tener una mejor producción para ofrecer a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Benjamín is 59 years old. He lives with his wife and his children in the Cayaltí District which is located in Chiclayo Province in the Lambayeque Region on the North Coast of Peru. The people here work in farming, commerce and raise livestock.

Benjamín raises and sells small animals, turkeys, chickens and guinea pigs at the back of his house. His wife helps him with this labor. He has requested a loan of 1, 500 PEN to buy balanced feed to fatten his animals. In this way he can have better production to offer his clients.

loans.use: to buy balanced feed to fatten his animals.

loans.name: Hector

texts.es:
Héctor tiene 41años de edad, vive junto a su esposa e hijos en el distrito de Yamango una comunidad que se dedica a la agricultura, comercio y ganadería, ubicada en la Provincia de Morropon que pertenece a la Región Piura, costa norte del Perú.

El se dedica al comercio de guayaquil, árbol que puede llegar a medir entre 20 a 30 metros de altura, los comercializa en el parque de su distrito que es utilizado para armar puestos de comercio, Héctor ha solicitado un préstamo de 3 500 nuevos soles para abonar sus cultivos y de esta manera tener una producción oportuna para ofrecer as su clientes.
texts.en:
Héctor is 41 years old and lives with his wife and children in the district of Yamango, a community where people work in agriculture, commerce and with livestock. It is located in Morropon province, which is part of the Piura region in the northern coast of Peru.

Héctor sells “guayaquil” [a tree similar to bamboo, also known as “guadua”], which can be 20 or 30 meters tall. He sells them at the central square, where they are used to build stalls. He has requested a loan of 3,500 nuevos soles [PEN] to spread fertilizer on his plantations and in this way be able to have them ready when his customers require them.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for his guayaquil [a sort of bamboo] plantation.

loans.name: Maria Julia

texts.es: Maria de 53 años de edad, vive con su familia en casa propia, desde hace 20 años que se dedica al oficio de corte y confección, tiempo en el cual ha ido adquiriendo mucha experiencia como también clientes fijos. Ella es una persona muy responsable, quien trabaja con mucho esmero por dar lo mejor de sí. María solicita un préstamo por medio del cual pueda invertir en su negocio, comprando mayor cantidad de materia prima como: telas, botones, hilos, y agujas, para poder atender mejor a sus clientes y no perder la oportunidad de obtener ganancias extras y asid arle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Maria is 53 years old. She lives with her family in her own house. For the past 20 years she has been working cutting and sewing. In this time she has gained much experience as well as many regular customers. She is s very responsible person who works with a lot of care to do her best. 

Maria is requesting a loan to invest in her business buying a large quantity of raw material like fabric, thread, buttons and needles. Then she can serve her clients well and she will not lose the opportunity to generate more revenue to provide her family with a higher quality of living.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons, needles, etc.

loans.name: Ángela

texts.es:
El Grupo De Crédito Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo que se reúnen cada 15 días en Los Bajos de Montecristi, ciudad conocida por su riqueza cultural y por su gran artesanía como por ejemplo los sombreros de paja toquillas conocidos dentro y fuera del país.
En este lugar vive la señora Ángela, tiene 46 años de edad, está casada y de esta relación tienen tres hijos, uno ya es mayor de edad y dos de 16 y 14 años que estudian en colegio, todos sus hijos aun vive en su casa. Su esposo es chofer.
Doña Ángela es una muy buena madre y esposa que hace lo posible para darles a sus hijos lo mejor, realiza el crédito una parte para ella y otra para su marido, ella se dedica a la cría de pollos y con sus ganancias cubre algunas necesidades de su hogar. Parte del crédito lo utiliza su marido para arreglos del carro que el utiliza para transportar personas de ciertas empresas, con esto el siempre ha ganado lo suficiente para sacar adelante su hogar.
Este crédito es para comprar alimento para los pollos y repuestos de carro. Lleva 16 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por la ayuda que siempre le han dado con los créditos. Sus sueños es tener un carro nuevo.
texts.en:
The credit group Con Amor Y Fe Hacia el Desarrollo meets every 15 days in Los Bajos de Montecristi, a city known for its rich culture and its great craft (such as straw hats and shawls, known throughout and outside of the country).

46-year-old Angela lives here. She is married and has three children, one of which is of legal age, and two others, ages 16 and 14, who are in school. All of her children still live at home. Her husband is a driver.

Angela is a wonderful mother and wife who does anything she can to give the best to her children. Part of this loan is for her and the other part is for her husband. She raises chickens and her profit covers various home necessities. Part of the loan will be used for her husband's car service, which he uses to transport people from certain companies. He has always made enough with this for his home to prosper. 

This loan is for the purchase of chicken feed and car parts. She has been a part of the credit group for 16 years and appreciates it for the help it has always given with loans. Their dream is to have a new car.

loans.use: buy chicken feed and car parts.

loans.name: Oysoat

texts.ru:
Ойсоату из Бохтара 56 лет. Она поставила перед собой цель открыть свой собственный магазин продуктов питания. На сегодняшний день Ойсоат нашла помещение и поставила полки для товаров. На данный момент ей помогают обустроиться ее сыновья. У Ойсоат 5 сыновей. Ее мужа нет в живых, и Ойсоат сама вырастила и поставила детей на ноги. 
Для осуществления мечты Ойсоату осталось только закупить товары. Для приобретения товаров она просит Вас помочь. Ойсоат планирует купить сладости, печение, продукты быстрого приготовления и другие продукты питание. Вы можете помочь Ойсоату реализовать мечту.
texts.en:
Oysoat is from Bokhtar and is 56 years old. She established a goal for herself to open her own grocery shop. Currently, Oysoat has already found a premises for her shop and has put up shelving for the goods. At the moment, her sons are helping her build the shop. Oysoat has 5 sons. Her husband passed away, so Oysoat raised her sons herself and got them on their feet.

In order to fulfill her dream, Oysoat only has left the task of buying goods to sell. She is asking your help to acquire these goods. Oysoat plans to buy sweets, cookies, instant food and other food products. You can help Oysoat realize her dream.

loans.use: to buy food products for retail sale in order to open her grocery shop.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es: Ana Mercedes tiene 24 años de edad, originaria de Managua. Soltera, madre de un hijo, estudia en una de las universidades de la ciudad. Su meta próxima es encontrar un trabajo, en el que pueda aplicar sus conocimientos. Solicita el crédito para pagar su título de finalización de estudios. Estima que el crédito le será de mucha ayuda para obtener su título y aspirar a un mejor puesto de trabajo. Su plan futuro es realizar un posgrado.
texts.en: Ana Mercedes is 24 years old and a native of Managua. She is single and the mother of one child. She studies at a university in the city. She is requesting a loan to pay for the diploma at the end of her studies. She believes the loan will be much help in getting her diploma and find a better job. Her plan for the future is work on a Post graduate degree.

loans.use: to pay for her diploma at the end if her studies.

loans.name: Anush

texts.en: This nice lady is 57 years old, and lives in Ijevan city in Tavush region.  Anush is married and has a son, who is already married.  He and his family live with her.  He has two children. Anush is a very laborious and active woman. At a very young age she lost her husband.  She used to solve all kinds of problems alone, despite her being a fragile and tender woman.  Anush had a clothes trading business, but now she works at a hotel as an administrator. Her son is a taxi driver. Together they try to provide for their family living, and sometimes they have a great lack of money.  Anush wants very much to make her grandchildren’s lives more comfortable.  She asks for a loan of 1,000,000 AMD to buy furniture for their bedroom.  She hopes for support, since the children will be extremely happy and touched by that kind of surprise that their grandmother wants to do for them.

loans.use: to buy bedroom furniture for her grandchildren.

loans.name: Ana Marleny

texts.es: Ana de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su familia, desde hace varios años se dedica a la agricultura siembra los principales granos básicos que son el maíz y frijol, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en sacos así como muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarlos a los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, Ana esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de los insumos necesarios como: semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así seguir con sus cultivos y darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Ana is 42 years old and lives in her own home with her family. She has worked in agriculture for several years. She sows the main basic grains, which are corn and beans. When her harvest is ready she keeps it in bags as the picture shows to later bring them to different markets near her place of residence to sell. She aims to cover some household expenses with the profit earned from her sales. Ana is requesting a loan to buy necessary supplies such as seed, fertilizer, pest control, herbicides, etc. so that she may continue with her crops and provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: buy seed, fertilizer, pest control, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: José Efraín

texts.es:
José es un joven de 23 años de edad, solamente estudió hasta sexto grado, está soltero y no tiene hijos, vive junto con sus padres los cuales dependen de él económicamente.

José trabaja en el ejército, pero también realiza el trabajo de la agricultura, solo lo hace en sus tiempos libres o cuando llega de visita a su casa, siendo su padre y su hermana quienes se involucran ayudándole a cultivar.
 
El crédito lo necesita para cubrir gastos de matrimonio, pues muy pronto se va a casar y también lo necesita para sembrar más cultivo, y por lo tanto el crédito cubrirá estas necesidades 

Él tiene como objetivo tener su propia casa y luego casarse, ya que actualmente vive con sus papas y dos hermanos más, espera trabajar muy duro para lograr sus metas.
texts.en:
Jose is 23 years old and only studied until the sixth grade. He is not married and does not have children. He lives with his parents, who depend on him financially.

Jose works in the armed forces, but he also carries out agricultural work. He only does this in his free time or when he visits his home, as his father and sister help him cultivate.

He needs this loan to cover marriage expenses, as he is going to get married very soon. He also needs it to plant more crops, and the loan will cover these necessities.

His goal is to own his own house and then get married, as he currently lives with his parents and two other siblings. He hopes to work very hard in order to meet his goals.

loans.use: cover marriage expenses and plant more crops.

loans.name: Pamela

texts.en: Pamela is a 43-year-old married woman. She has four children. She describes herself as being creative and committed. She operates a grocery store where she sells tomatoes, onions, and fish. She has been involved in this business for eight years. Her business is located in a viable location and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds. She will use the KES 20,000 loan to buy more stocks of fish, tomatoes, and onions. Her business goal is to have a big store within five years. She hopes that she will have a bright future. This is her first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: buy more stocks of fish, tomatoes, and onions.

loans.name: Karine

texts.en:
Karine lives in Hovtashen village with her husband and three sons, ages 20, 17, and 11 years old.

Karine works at a shop as a seller and also runs a farm. She owns greenhouses where she cultivates potatoes and tomatoes. She also grows apricot, peach, and pear trees. Her sons help her to sell the gathered harvest in nearby markets and the family is able to earn an income for living. 

Now, to be able to continue her farming business, Karine needs a financial investment for her farm. The requested loan of USD 1,500 will be a huge support for renovation of the greenhouse. Karine hopes for lenders' goodwill and support.

loans.use: to pay for renovation of the greenhouse.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy wheat flour, rice and sugar to sell.

loans.name: Razia

texts.en:
Razia is 31 years old and married. She is in the business of selling milk. She has two calves and two cows in milk. She sells milk to many of her neighbors, along with butter that she makes from the milk. Her business is good enough to allow her to lead a decent life. She has improved her business to meet day-to-day expenses.  

Razia requested her a loan from Kashf Foundation for 55,000 PKR, which she will use to purchase one more cow. She hopes to increase her production capacity of milk which ultimately helps in generating more cash.  She is very motivated to provide her family with good health, food, and clothing.

loans.use: to purchase one more cow.

loans.name: José Cirilo

texts.es:
José tiene 40 años de edad, solo estudió hasta primer grado no pudo continuar debido a la falta de recursos económicos, ahora él está acompañado y tiene cinco hijos de los cuales cuatro de ellos asisten a la escuela. 

José se dedica a la agricultura desde hace más de 20 años, esta actividad la aprendió gracias a su papá que lo instruyó en la siembra de granos básicos siendo esta la única actividad a la cual se dedica, para llegar al lugar de trabajo debe hacer un recorrido diario de 30 minutos.

Él solicita este crédito para la siembra de granos básicos lo cual las ganancias le ayudarán a seguir manteniendo a su familia, además de ganar un dinero extra con la venta de los productos agrícolas.

Sus sueños son que sus hijos estudien ya que él no tuvo la oportunidad para poder tener un buen nivel académico, las ganancias del negocio le ayudarán a seguir trabajando fuertemente para que sus hijos tengan un futuro mejor.
texts.en:
Jose is 40 years old and only studied up to the first grade. He could not continue due to a lack of economic resources. Now he is married and has five children, four of which are in school.

Jose has worked in agriculture for more than 20 years. He learned this activity from his father who taught him how to plant basic grains, as this is his only job. To get to his job site he must travel 30 minutes a day.

He is requesting this loan to plant basic grains. The profit from this will help him continue to take care of his family, as well as make some extra money by selling agricultural products.

His dream is for his children to go to school, as he did not have the opportunity to reach a good academic level. His trade profits will help him to continue working hard so that his children may have a better future.

loans.use: plant basic grains.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es:
José tiene 34 años de edad, solo estudió hasta noveno grado, está casado y su pareja se dedica a los oficios domésticos, tiene 3 hijos que viven con ellos y toda su familia depende de él. 

Él toda su vida se ha dedicado a la agricultura, actividad que desde su niñez cuando le ayudaba a su padre en el campo. José cultiva maíz y actualmente es ayudante de descarga de concentrado y tiene que viajar hasta la ciudad para trabajar.

El préstamo que está solicitando lo necesita para poner una tienda, pues él y su esposa han decidido tener su propio negocio y es por ello que quieren invertir, y otra parte del dinero lo utilizará para sembrar maíz con regadío.

El espera tener siempre trabajo para mantener a su  familia y seguir dándoles la educación a sus hijos.
texts.en:
José is 34 years old and only studied up to 9th grade. He is married and his partner takes care of the housework. José has 3 children who live with them and all of his family depends on him.

All of his life, José has worked in agricultur - since his childhood when he helped his father in the fields. José grows corn and currently helps to unload concentrate and has to travel to the city to work.

José is asking for this loan in order to set up a shop, as he and his wife have decided to set up their own business, and so that is why they want to invest. Another part of the money will be used to sow corn with irrigation.

José hopes to always have work to support his family and continue giving his children an education.

loans.use: to set up a shop and sow corn with irrigation.

loans.name: Unidos Por Jehova Group

texts.es: Juliana de 68 años de edad es separada con 03 hijos independientes. Ella forma parte del grupo “Unidos Por Jehova” y está formado por 05 socias emprendedoras y responsables. Juliana se dedica a la venta de comida como el cebiche. Ella tiene proyectado acondicionar y ampliar su local. Solicitó el crédito para la compra de pescado, papa, cebolla y de esta manera preparar sus comidas para sus comensales. El grupo “Unidos Por Jehova” agradecen a los inversionistas Kiva por darles la oportunidad de crecer en sus negocios. Juliana es la segunda del lado izquierdo y viste polo rosado.
texts.en: Juliana is 68 years old and is separated with 3 independent children. She is a part of the group "Unidos Por Jehova" that is comprised of 5 partners and leaders. Juliana sells food such as ceviche. She is planning to prepare and expand its location. She requested this loan to buy fish, potatoes, and onions to prepare food for her guests. The "Unidos Por Jehova" group thanks the Kiva investors for giving them the opportunity to grow their businesses. Juliana appears second from the left in the photo and is wearing a pink shirt.

loans.use: buy fish, potatoes, and onions to prepare meals for their guests.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more rice, oil, peppers, etc., for her business.

loans.name: Ana Lucia

texts.es: Ana tiene 40 años de edad y junto a su esposo han procreado 6 hijos quienes son su principal fuente de inspiración para luchar por mejores condiciones de vida. Ana trabaja como empleada en una institución pública cercana a su localidad y junto a su  esposo mantiene la economía de su familia y llevan el sustento diario. Ana desea mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda para lo cual ha priorizado algunas zonas que son más urgentes de mejorar tales como: el piso, columnas y paredes del baño sanitario. Para poder proceder requiere de un financiamiento dado que no puede hacer el desembolso por su cuenta. Por lo anterior solicita este crédito a FUSAI para invertir en la compra de los materiales necesarios como: cemento, arena, ladrillo, grava y hierro.
texts.en: Ana is 40 years old. She and her husband have 6 children, who are her main source of inspiration to fight for better life conditions. Ana is an employee of a public institution near where she lives. She and her husband manage the family finances and give the family daily support. Ana wishes to improve her housing conditions, and so she has prioritized certain areas that require more urgent improvements, such as: the floor, columns, and walls of the bathroom. She requires financing in order to proceed, as she cannot make the payment on her own. Therefore she is requesting this loan from FUSAI to invest in buying the necessary materials, such as: cement, sand, bricks, gravel, and iron.

loans.use: buy cement, sand, bricks, gravel, and iron to set the floor of her house in concrete, to repair its columns, and to construct bathroom walls.

loans.name: Norma Lylliam

texts.es: Doña Norma es una señora que trabaja como conserje, compra y vende pan en su casa de habitación, a futuro espera con esfuerzos y sacrificio poner una panadería para ir mejorando su economía, su esposo es carpintero, procrearon 2 hijas que van independizándose poco a poco, Norma desea hacer mejoras en su hogar, por lo que solicita de este primer crédito para levantar un muro que será destinado para cuarto.
texts.en: Norma works as a janitor. She also buys and sells bread in her house. In the future she hopes to open a bakery with effort and sacrifice in order to keep improving her finances. Her husband is a carpenter. They have 2 children who are little by little becoming independent. Norma wishes to make improvements to her home. For this reason she is requesting this first loan to build a bedroom wall.

loans.use: buy materials such as cement, sand, iron, blocks, and stones.

loans.name: Tamari

texts.en:
Tamari  is a 20-year-old young woman from village Natakhtari. She lives with her husband and father-in-law, who is an operator at a private company and monthly earns 400 GEL. Her husband is unemployed nowadays. Tamari is a hard-worker, who puts much effort into helping her family to earn their living and cover the family's increasing needs. She is involved in a trading business, particularly she buys meat at wholesale prices and sells from her house at a higher price. Tamari has her own customers, as she always has fresh meat. 

Now Tamari wants to improve her business and expand it. She was selling meat from a counter and now she has been building a little store near her house. In order to develop her business further, she requested a loan of 2,000 GEL to finish construction and buy an inventory of meat. She will then sell meat products to a larger market and will serve clients more comfortably. Tamari has now been approved for a loan within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The Start up Program gives rural poor people the chance to start or re-start businesses. 

Tamari and her family rely on the good will of the lenders and will be thankful to them for their support in collecting the needed loan to sustain his business.

loans.use: to purchase inventory of meat

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more oil and cold water for her business.

loans.name: Angga

texts.en:
Angga lives west of Bandung, about three hours from Jakarta. He manages a small shop selling mobile accessories and mobile phone airtime credit. Angga is single.

Angga joined Ruma one month ago because he finds it interesting selling mobile phone airtime credits. With assistance and support from Ruma’s staff, he is seeing improvements in his shop.  For the last month, he has earned an average of $30 per day  in mobile phone airtime credit sales.  He hopes to get a Kiva loan as working capital to process more transactions.  His goal for his business is to expand and do more new business in the future.

loans.use: to process more mobile phone airtime credit transactions on weekends

loans.name: Cesar Edgardo

texts.es: Cesar de 52 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, sus dos hijos, sus dos nueras y dos nietos, el se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y frijol, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas y con la ayuda de sus hijos logran salir adelante con los gastos del hogar, Cesar esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, etc. y así seguir con sus siembras y darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Cesar is 52 years old and lives in his own home with his wife, two sons, their wives and two grandchildren. Cesar works in agriculture, and his main harvest is corn and beans. He sells his products at different markets near his home, and with the earnings from his sales and the help of his sons they manage to pay the household bills.

Cesar is asking for a loan in order to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest controls, weed-killers etc. so he can continue sowing crops and giving his family what they need with no limitations.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, manure, pest control, weed-killers etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
